experiences.description:
Finding the best fit talent. Strengthening employer brand through recruitment. Transforming leadership and businesses through critical hires. These are what we provide for our clients!

Inspired by the Roman god Janus – the symbol of new beginnings, new journeys, and opening doors – Janus was founded with the aim to connect great organizations and great talent. Helping clients since 2016, we support companies and talent across Asia with executive recruitment and talent advisory services.

Our focused industries include: Financial Services, Retail, Real Estate, Emerging technologies (such as e-commerce, new retail, edtech, proptech, fintech, etc.). We pride ourselves on five major specialties:
a) Transformer: talent who are transformation/change leaders across technology, marketing, strategy, product, finance, HR, data, risk, commercial, etc.
b) Builder: talent who can set things up from the beginning, who can bring structure into chaos
c) Excellency: talent who bring in execution excellence and expertise of business optimisation.
d) Conqueror: talent who can help your company expand into new markets/ territories
e) Fighter: talent who can help turning around business to profitability.

Visit us at www.janus-hk.com
